patterns: What is the current covid status in India?
What is the current covid status in the world?
How can I find available beds in my area?
responses: This link will help you get required covid-19 medical resources - https://covid-resources-chi.vercel.app/

Plasma is a yellow colored component consisting of 55% of your total body blood which can be separated from blood through centrifugation. A COVID survivor (after 28 days of recovery) can donate plasma because it contains stored antibodies that can fight coronavirus. You can donate it here https://plasmadonor.in/

patterns: is black fungus related to blood oxygen level
responses: Black Fungus is a non-contagious fungus which grows in certain part of body and damage it generally caused by micromycetes. Swollen or red eye, chest pain, throat pain or blackening at upper portion of your mouth, nasal blockage, bleeding, discharge from the nose are some of the common symptoms of this fungal infection.

patterns: who are prone to black fungus
Is black fungus related to blood oxygen level
responses: Patients who are recovering from covid, diabetic patients, patients who are on steroids are most likely to suffer from black fungus. It doesn't affect your blood oxygen level. It is generally found in dirty places, soil, contruction site etc.

patterns: should i store it in home
responses: Remdesivir, sold under the brand name Veklury, is a broad-spectrum antiviral medication developed by the biopharmaceutical companys, price of one injection may vary upto 5000 Rs. One should take only after doctors prescription, and if doctor asks you to keep stock of it and permit you in written then only you can keep 1-2 in stock in your home. Sideffects of Remdisiver are, An infusion reaction may occur with remdesivir with symptoms such as low blood pressure, nausea, vomiting, sweating, and shivering.

patterns: upto how many days should I take medicine if affected by covid
how much time does it take to completely recover from covid
what to eat in recovery phase
responses: Take doctors's consultation but the due course is of 14 days. To get the regular immunity back it will take months but for general working pupose it can be recoverd after 20-25 days of testing negative from covid. Eat those items which are rich in Vitamin C, eat lots of fruits, take full meal as you do regularly

patterns: how many masks to use outside
how many masks to use inside home
what kind of mask to use
is home made masks are sufficient
responses: Double mask is necessary to be on the safer side, single if no one is affected in the house, if using surgical mask then change it after every 4 hours, if home made mask then wash it after time to time. If the mask have atleast 3 layers then it is sufficient inside the home

patterns: how many times to sanitize hands
washing hands with soap is enough
responses: Any sanitizer with minimum 60% alcohol content is fine, whenever you touch anything outside and after 20 min minutes if you are outside, for atleast 1-2 minutes. Sanitiation outside is enough but at home you should mostly try to wash hands for atleast 40-60 sec from all the angle and part of palm
